scenario.name: UAS Callhold Scenario
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Contact: <sip:bob@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=bob 636375 3412 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=sendrecv

v=0 o=bob 636375 3413 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=recvonly
